metadata.title: FTL: MULTIVERSE - CORE DATA
metadata.author: Jersee, Laythe, PDTM, Moreorlesser, Felipemello, SquishyBoi, Maddie Doktor, R4V3-0N, localresources, Lucca, Foo757
metadata.description: Contains all core data files and LUA scripts for the base Multiverse mod. Make sure this is ALWAYS patched!
